About this style

Look on-trend with minimum effort in this versatile denim skirt. It's cut to a stylish maxi length from pure cotton with a hint of stretch for comfortable wear. The panelled design lends it a voluminous feel while ensuring a flattering silhouette. It fastens with a side zip for a practical finish. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.

02 February 2025SomebodysMum

Gorgeous, but not big enough for curves

Gorgeous skirt, beautiful quality and style, great length and nice weight of denim. But why does it only go up to a size 22? Denim tends to be tailored and unforgiving, I find I often need to size up in denim skirts and this fitted style is no different, the 22 fits like a sausage casing, a 24 would have worked. In the old days it used to be possible to even find the occasional M&S 26, which was great for denim, as could alter it to the right fit. Please M&S, make this in a 24 and go back to having a capsule range of slightly larger sizes too when it comes to denim and tailored items.
